abstract: The battle between Donald Trump and Carl C. Icahn over the future of the bankrupt Trump Entertainment Resorts continued Wednesday as Mr. Trump an his daughter Ivanka Trump asked a judge to allow them vote on Mr. Icahn’s restructuring plan.
snippet: The battle between Donald Trump and Carl C. Icahn over the future of the bankrupt Trump Entertainment Resorts continued Wednesday as Mr. Trump an his daughter Ivanka Trump asked a judge to allow them vote on Mr. Icahn’s restructuring plan.
lead_paragraph: The battle between Donald Trump and Carl C. Icahn over the future of the bankrupt Trump Entertainment Resorts continued Wednesday, as Mr. Trump and his daughter, Ivanka, asked a judge to allow them to vote on Mr. Icahn’s restructuring plan.

headline.main: Trump Moves Against Icahn’s Casino Plan
